label: financedTotalAmount
comment: A financed total monetary value in this financing summary document.
A monetary value of the financed total amount in this financing request result document.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of data that reports the result of a financing request.
A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.
